Package farmersMarkets

Class DatabaseManager

java.lang.Object
farmersMarkets.DatabaseManager
public class DatabaseManager extends Object
The DatabaseManager class takes care of all sql queries and inserts for the database.

    • addMarket

      public void addMarket(int fmid, String name, String street, String city, String state, String zip_code, String county, ArrayList<String> links, ArrayList<String> schedule, ArrayList<String> tags, String location, String updated)
      Adds a market to the database.
      Parameters:
      fmid - id
      name - market name
      street - market street
      city - market city
      state - market state
      zip_code - market zip_code
      county - market county
      links - website, facebook, twitter, youtube, and other media links/usernames
      schedule - seasons 1-4 dates and times of opening
      tags - things available
      location - the longitude and latitude of this market
      updated - when this information is from

      Returns:

    • cityStateMarketItems

      public javafx.collections.ObservableList<MarketItem> cityStateMarketItems(String city, String state, double distance, javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent> openMarketTab)
      Returns an observable list of market items within distance miles of city and state.
      Parameters:
      city - the origin city
      state - the origin state
      distance - max distance from origin
      openMarketTab - event handler for market items
      Returns:
      observable list of market items

      Adds a review to the reviews table in the database.
      Parameters:
      fmid - market id
      rating - user rating
      username - user's unique display name
      comment - user's comment
      posted - date and time posted
      Returns:
      the Review
